mainBoard.flavorText:
"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."
"Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?"
"Yes."
"So shouldn't we—"
"No."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir schleichen uns über diese Klippen, überqueren die wackelige Brücke, und suchen uns dann einen Weg durch die Vulkanhänge auf der anderen Seite."„Ich dachte, der kürzeste Weg wäre durch die Schlucht?"„Das stimmt."„Sollten wir dann nicht...?"„Nein."
foreignData.name: Bergschlucht-Minotaurus

foreignData.flavorText: "Escalaremos estas cornisas, atravesaremos el Puente Frágil y luego bajaremos por las pendientes volcánicas del otro lado.""¿Pero la ruta más corta no es por el desfiladero?""Sí.""¿Entonces no deberíamos...?""No."
foreignData.name: Minotauro del desfiladero

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous escaladerons ces falaises, nous traverserons Frêlepont et nous nous fraierons un chemin sur les pentes volcaniques avec nos armes. »« Ce n'est pas plus court en passant par le canyon ? »« Si, en effet. »« Ne devrait-on alors pas — »« Non. »
foreignData.name: Minotaure des canyons

foreignData.flavorText: "Scaliamo questi dirupi, attraversiamo Ponte Friabile e poi ci facciamo strada scendendo lungo le scarpate vulcaniche sull'altro lato.""Non è più corto attraversare il canyon?""Sì.""Quindi non dovremmo...""No."
foreignData.name: Minotauro del Canyon

foreignData.flavorText: 「ここの崖を登り、崩れ橋を渡って、逆側の火口坂を戦いながら下がっていくことになります。」「これは峡谷の一番の近道じゃなかったのか？」「間違いないです。」「それならそんな――」「駄目です。」
foreignData.name: 峡谷のミノタウルス
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ミノタウルス・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: "이제 우리는 이 절벽을 타고 올라가서 아슬아슬한 다리를 건넌 다음 적진을 뚫고 그 너머에 있는 화산 언덕을 내려가야 해.""협곡을 가로지르는 게 훨씬 빠르지 않아?""맞아.""그럼 그쪽으로 가는 게...""안돼."
foreignData.name: 협곡 미노타우로스

foreignData.flavorText: "Nós vamos escalar essas colinas, atravessar a Ponte Quebradiça, e batalhar para descer do outro lado, nas encostas vulcânicas.""Não há uma rota mais rápida pelo cânion?""Sim.""Então não deveríamos...""Não."
foreignData.name: Minotauro do Desfiladeiro

foreignData.flavorText: — Мы взберемся на вот эти утесы, перейдем Шаткий Мост, а потом проложим себе путь вниз, по склонам вулкана на другой стороне.— Но ведь самый короткий путь лежит через каньон?— Да.— Так, может, нам надо...— Не надо.
foreignData.name: Каньонный Минотавр

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们要爬上这些悬崖，横越危桥，然后从另一侧的火山坡一路打下去。」「最短路径不是横越峡谷吗？」「对。」「那么我们难道～」「不能。」
foreignData.name: 峡谷牛头怪

foreignData.flavorText: 「我們要爬上這些懸崖，橫越危橋，然後從另一側的火山坡一路打下去。」「最短路徑不是橫越峽谷嗎？」「對。」「那麼我們難道～」「不能。」

mainBoard.name: Thunder Strike
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

rulings.text: If a creature doesn’t have first strike, granting it first strike after combat damage has been dealt in the first-strike combat damage step won’t prevent it from dealing combat damage. It will still assign and deal its combat damage in the second combat damage step.
Thunder Strike can target any creature, even one that already has first strike or double strike. (If it affects such a creature, it will, in effect, just give it +2/+0.)

mainBoard.name: Flames of the Firebrand
mainBoard.originalText: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: You divide the damage as you cast Flames of the Firebrand, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage. (In other words, as you put the spell on the stack, you choose whether to have it deal 3 damage to a single target, 2 damage to one target and 1 damage to another target, or 1 damage to each of three targets.)

foreignData.flavorText: "원래 눈치 보는걸 싫어해서."—대지술사 라이다
foreignData.name: 지진의 발구르기
foreignData.text: 비행 능력이 없는 생물들은 이 턴에 방어할 수 없다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Não é da minha natureza andar com cuidado."— Ryda, geomante
foreignData.name: Pisada Sísmica
foreignData.text: As criaturas sem voar não podem bloquear neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Осмотрительность — не для меня. Я иду прямиком к цели».— Райда, геомант
foreignData.name: Сейсмическая Поступь
foreignData.text: Существа без Полета не могут блокировать в этом ходу.

foreignData.flavorText: 「蹑手蹑脚不是我的本性。」～大地术士濑达
foreignData.name: 雷动跺
foreignData.text: 不具飞行异能的生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

foreignData.flavorText: 「躡手躡腳不是我的本性。」～大地術士瀨達
foreignData.name: 雷動跺
foreignData.text: 不具飛行異能的生物本回合不能進行阻擋。

mainBoard.name: Seismic Stomp
mainBoard.originalText: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

rulings.text: No creature without flying will be able to block that turn, including creatures that lose flying after Seismic Stomp resolves and creatures without flying that enter the battlefield after Seismic Stomp resolves.

mainBoard.text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The common folk call it the breaking of the crust or the spilling of fire. Geomancers call it target practice."
—Ryda, geomancer

foreignData.flavorText: „Normale Leute nennen es das Durchbrechen der Kruste oder das Freisetzen des Feuers. Geomanten nennen es Zielübungen."—Ryda, Geomant
foreignData.name: Vulkanischer Geysir
foreignData.text: Der Vulkanische Geysir fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: "La gente corriente lo llama ruptura de la corteza o río de fuego. Los geomantes lo llaman práctica."—Ryda, geomante
foreignData.name: Géiser volcánico
foreignData.text: El Géiser volcánico hace X puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le peuple appelle cela une fissure de l'écorce terrestre ou une éruption. Les géomanciens parlent plutôt de tir sur cible. »—Ryda, géomancien
foreignData.name: Geyser volcanique
foreignData.text: Le Geyser volcanique inflige X blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: "La gente comune lo chiama 'rottura della crosta' o 'getto di fuoco'. I geomanti parlano di 'pratica nel tiro al bersaglio'."—Ryda, geomante
foreignData.name: Geyser Vulcanico
foreignData.text: Il Geyser Vulcanico infligge X danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「素人はあれを見て地殻が割れただの炎が噴き出しただの言うが、地操術士はあれを射撃訓練と呼ぶんだ。」――地操術士ライダ
foreignData.name: 溶岩噴火
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。溶岩噴火はそれにＸ点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: "평범한 사람들은 이 주문을 대지 분쇄 또는 화염 방출이라고 부른더군. 대지술사들 한테는 그냥 사격 연습이야."—대지술사 라이다
foreignData.name: 화산 분출
foreignData.text: 생물 한 개나 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 화산 분출은 그 목표에 피해 X점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: "As pessoas comuns chamam de cindir da crosta ou derrame de fogo. Os geomantes chamam de tiro ao alvo."— Ryda, geomante
foreignData.name: Gêiser Vulcânico
foreignData.text: Gêiser Vulcânico causa X pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «В народе это называется "лопнула корка" или "пролился огонь". У геомантов это называется "мы пристреливаемся"».— Райда, геомант
foreignData.name: Вулканический Гейзер
foreignData.text: Вулканический Гейзер наносит X повреждений целевому существу или игроку.

foreignData.flavorText: 「普通人称之为地壳断裂或火焰涌出。大地术士称之为练习打靶。」～大地术士濑达
foreignData.name: 火泉喷发
foreignData.text: 火泉喷发对目标生物或牌手造成X点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 「普通人稱之為地殼斷裂或火焰湧出。大地術士稱之為練習打靶。」～大地術士瀨達
foreignData.name: 火泉噴發
foreignData.text: 火泉噴發對目標生物或玩家造成X點傷害。

mainBoard.name: Volcanic Geyser
mainBoard.originalText: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.
